hero.title: What can I help you <accent>find</accent> today?
hero.subtitle: Search the web, summarize documents, and analyze data in seconds with our advanced AI assistant.

instantAnswers.title: Instant Answers
instantAnswers.desc: Powered by the fastest neural networks to give you results in milliseconds.

privateSecure.title: Private & Secure
privateSecure.desc: Your data is encrypted and never used for training without your explicit consent.

globalSearch.title: Global Search
globalSearch.desc: Access information from across the entire web, localized in over 50 languages.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get the answers you need in three simple steps.

ask.title: Ask a question
ask.desc: Type your question in natural language or upload a document â€” like chatting with an expert.

analyze.title: AI analyzes

deliver.title: Get results
deliver.desc: Receive a structured summary with source citations so you can dive deeper.

useCases.title: Use cases
useCases.subtitle: From academic research to business analysis to everyday tasks.

research.title: Academic Research
research.desc: Quickly search papers, summarize literature, and make literature reviews more efficient.

business.title: Business Decisions
business.desc: Analyze market trends, competitor insights, and back your decisions with data.
